participant_abstract.sent: Firstly we covered the minutes from last meeting, and then the 2 designers presented their prototypes.
These were 2 very similar models but embodied the options we hadnt decided on yet: whether to be round and smooth or banana-shaped, and whether to be hard plastic or softer rubber.

There were also two different options of button 'compass point' so we had to discuss them. we then evaluated the product in terms of all the categories of style and function, practicality and cost. it was all satisfactory.

participant_decisions.sent: Material: plastic is cheaper bhut even rubber was well within our price boundaries . see excel spreadsheet for details.
Product is bright yellow with black buttons, reflecting company colours.
Implies banana shape but isnt specifically a banana.
Push buttons in a simple 'compass point' setting with enter button and menues on screen.

participant_problems.sent: The 'trendiness' issue isnt complately addressed because the product isnt explicitly fruit themed although it does imply abstracted organic forms.
We didnt know enough about programming to be able to know exactly about the menue on-screen television programming.. but just follow existing sky-cable technology.
